title: Can't create a PBE account
body:
Hey, could anyone help me out here?
The website says I've already made a PBE account whenever I've tried to create one, and whenever I try to find that account's information, the info doesn't send to my email. I've never made a PBE account before.

replies.body: You should be able to create one via the[ PBE Sign Up Link](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe), and the email would be the one registered to your account.  We can help update your info and assist with recovery as well through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)!
I can't use the account recovery form, because the captcha is nonexistent. I'm also unable to use the PBE sign up link, as it states that I've already made an account, even though I haven't.

That's a strange case, the new system should have prompted you to select a new username.  Since the form didn't work, reach out to us via support@riotgames.com instead and we'll reply back through email.
